key_decisions: Converted TypeScript to JavaScript with JSDoc type annotations for compatibility
Added ESM module support to package.json (type: module)
Migrated jest.config to ESM export default syntax
Fixed __dirname unavailable in ESM with fileURLToPath + dirname

105 comprehensive tests covering all operations
